title: Meaning Wants Sacrament: Vervaeke, JBP, Sam Harris, CS Lewis and the Last Battle
description:
Meaning can never be satisfied with feeling status. We want it down to the roots, in the flesh, and unto eternity. Lots of stuff in this one. How JBP beat Sam Harris. How a CRC pastor reads Michael Pollan on psychedelics, and how CS Lewis makes me feel all flow-state-ish, and Shamanism too! 

Vervaeke Awakening from the Meaning Crisis pt2 https://youtu.be/aF9HeXg65AE

Mouthy Buddha https://youtu.be/iBSOTY1rTtg

5 Lessons Jordan Peterson Young Fogey https://www.patheos.com/blogs/youngfogey/2019/02/5-lessons-jordan-peterson-has-taught-the-church/

https://www.amazon.com/Change-Your-Mind-Consciousness-Transcendence-ebook/dp/B076GPJXWZ

https://www.amazon.com/Last-Battle-Chronicles-Narnia-Book-ebook/dp/B001I45UE8/
